title: 130 98 38 "Stowaway""Scent of Danger! The Seventh Member is Nico Robin!"Transliteration: "Kiken na kaori! Shichininme wa Niko Robin!" (Japanese:危険な香り!七人目はニコ·ロビン!) Yoko Ikeda Yoshiyuki Suga October 27, 2002(2002-10-27)[113] July 28, 2007[114][115]
transformers_text: 130 98 38 Stowaway Scent of Danger The Seventh Member is Nico Robin Transliteration Ki ken na kaori Shi chin in me wa Niko Robin Japanese Yoko Ikeda Yoshiyuki Suga October 27 2002 2002 10 27 113 July 28 2007 114 115 The Marines fail again to catch the Straw Hats After escaping from the Marines Nico Robin Ms All Sunday appears from inside of the Straw Hats ship She manages to persuade the crew to let her join Pell who's survive from the bomb's explosion seen at the end standing over his own grave
tf_idf_text: stowaway scent danger seventh member nico robin transliteration ken kaori shi chin niko robin japanese yoko ikeda yoshiyuki suga october july marine fail catch straw hat escape marine nico robin sunday appear inside straw hat ship manages persuade crew let join pell whos survive bomb explosion see end stand grave
